source.body: Do not wash in the sink.

source.description: Remove the underdrain (the soft plastic under the plate).
Perform all work in laminar flow hood.

Use IPFL for Fluorospot (Mabtech).

description: This protocol details the steps required to collect and assay mouse anti-human cells using fluorospot assay.
